attributes.action: Not allow any special treatment to people coming into the country or because of their religion.
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: by special treatment i mean for example giving housing before people who were brought up in this country or who have british citizenship even if they are family of someone who has. or any benefits as they have not earned them by paying into the system. also do not be so lenient with religious people especialy fanatics, although it does seem to be mainly muslims but we cannot say that because it may offend. if we cause offence because it is not how it is done in this country then tough luck, you decided to come here.
